tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE tournament_brackets (
  bracket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  bracket_name VARCHAR(255),
  playoff_round INT,
  championship_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE tournament_brackets (
    bracket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bracket_name TEXT,
    team1 TEXT,
    team2 TEXT,
    winner TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tournament_brackets (
  bracket_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  bracket_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  league_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  team1_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  team2_id INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE playoff_standings (
  playoff_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  playoff_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  league_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  team_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
  playoff_round INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE basketball_leagues (
  league_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  league_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  league_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  established_year INTEGER NOT NULL,
  commissioner VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE playoff_standings (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255),
    games_played INT,
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255),
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    jersey_number INT
);
